title: Sheikh, can you share with us, how you spend your day & all the ibadah you do Conceal voluntary deed
transcript: from India Sheikh my question is can I can you please describe step by step your 24 hours daily routine if you wish to share with us and with ibadas what you do how you balance your worldly life and so that Muslims can learn no I I don't want to share this with anyone for asking [Music] uh and have you ever taken a counseling session with me go to my website and you will find counseling sessions and apply for one if you can afford it that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled for one free session and this is for everybody if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot afford it because they're poor I'll give them one free session without a problem a full half an hour so come to me and let's speak about it inshallah within the following two days or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's guidance to solve your problem once and for Allah
